name: Madolche Ticket
effectText: If another "Madolche" card(s) you control or in your GY is added to your hand or shuffled into your Main Deck by a card effect: Add 1 "Madolche" monster from your Deck to your hand. If you control a Fairy "Madolche" monster, you can Special Summon the monster from your Deck in Attack Position instead of adding it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Madolche Ticket" once per turn.
